name: Chesticuffs: Evolution
description:
This is a rythm game. It is best played without lag. Downloading it will yield the best experience.
 Story

This game was inspired by a Minecraft video by TommyInnit titled: "Minecraft's Lava Ravine Mod is actually funny...". In this video, TommyInnit, WilburSoot, Slimecicle (Charlie), and PhilzaMinecraft play a mod, in which there is a giant lava ravine, that also grows over time.*

Since this would mean the end of the world and all living things, Wilbur and Charlie decide to collect a bunch of seeds from all over the world to put in a 'seed vault'. They find especial interest in the 'Oxeye Daysie'.

Back inside the house they built above the ravine, Wilbur places down a chest and starts an improv-bit.

The rest of the story will be explained in the game.

Gameplay

You have to quickly choose between three cards with predetermined positions and then play a rhythm game while thinking about your next move. The better you are the the rhythm game, the more you evolve.

More Infos during the game.

Content
  • 5 different levels with special generations for each and bits of story
  • 9 unique generations to evolve through
  • 26 total items grouped into the generations
  • 6 varied songs to accompany you. Each song has about 3 adaptive layers which change depending on your performance
Controls

Everything is controlled with the left mouse button

Xanderjam

This game was created for the Xanderjam #3 hosted by Xanderwood. The theme for the jam was Evolution. The time limit was 7 days. This is a solo entry.

Credits
  • Game Design: me
  • Code: me
  • Music: me
  • Sounds: me
  • 'Art': me
  • Voice: I'll give you three guesses who that could be...
